title.en: A Universally Beneficial Prayer, Aspiration, and Supplication to the Three Jewels and Three Roots

text.en: With my three doors in a state of one-pointed and unshakable faith, I prostrate to and take refuge in you, the victorious buddhas of all times and directions, together with your heirs. Grant your blessings that we might free ourselves and every other sentient being from saṃsāra’s ocean of suffering, and thus fully manifest everlasting bliss—the noble state of a complete and perfect buddha!
text.en-trans: chok chu dü sum gyi gyalwa sé dang chepa tamché la go sum michepé depa tsechik pé chaktsal zhing kyab su chi o dak dang semchen tamché khorwa dukngal gyi gyatso chenpo lé tar té ten gyi dewa yangdakpa dzokpé sangye kyi gopang dampa ngön du gyurwar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Namo. Three Jewels and Three Roots, every single victor,
text.en-trans: namo, chok sum tsa sum gyalwa malüpa

text.en: Abundant with love for beings, vast as space,
text.en-trans: khanyam dro la jampé khur chenpö

text.en: Shine bright your sunlight upon the profound path,
text.en-trans: marik dribpé mongpé dulja la

text.en: For we are mired in the darkness of our ignorance!
text.en-trans: zablam nyi ösalwar ten du sol

text.en: O peerless teacher, Lord of the Sages,
text.en-trans: tönpa nyammé tubpé wangpo dang

text.en: And all the past tathāgatas as well as those to come:
text.en-trans: dé dang ma ong dezhin shekpa nam

text.en: Please consider us with your love and kindness;
text.en-trans: dak sok dro la nyingjé tser gong té

text.en: Let the blessed rain of your compassion fall upon us all!
text.en-trans: tukjé jinlab char gyün wab tu sol

text.en: O Prajñāpāramitā, supreme mother of the victors,
text.en-trans: gyalyum chenmo sherab parol chin

text.en: Essence of all scriptures of the nine-staged vehicles:
text.en-trans: tekpa rim gü sung rab malüpa

text.en: Please consider us, with your love and kindness;
text.en-trans: dak sok dro la nyingjé tser gong té

text.en: Let the blessed rain of your compassion fall upon us all!
text.en-trans: tukjé jinlab char gyün wab tu sol

text.en: O Mañjuśrī, Vajrapāṇi, and Avalokiteśvara,
text.en-trans: jamyang chak na dorjé chenrezik

text.en: And the noble assembly of the victor’s heirs:
text.en-trans: gyalsé pakpé tsok nam malüpa

text.en: Please consider us with your love and kindness;
text.en-trans: dak sok dro la nyingjé tser gong té

text.en: Let the blessed rain of your compassion fall upon us all!
text.en-trans: tukjé jinlab char gyün wab tu sol

text.en: Great Guru of Uḍḍiyāna, king and disciples, Marpa and Mila,
text.en-trans: orgyen chenpo jebang mar mi sok

text.en: All of you glorious root and lineage masters:
text.en-trans: tsa gyü palden lama tamché kyi

text.en: Please consider us with your love and kindness;
text.en-trans: dak sok dro la nyingjé tser gong té

text.en: Let the blessed rain of your compassion fall upon us all!
text.en-trans: tukjé jinlab char gyün wab tu sol

text.en: Kālacakra, Vajrasattva, Cakrasaṃvara, and Hevajra,
text.en-trans: dükhor dorsem demchok kyé dorjé

text.en: And the assembly of yidam deities of the four classes of tantra:
text.en-trans: yidam gyüdé zhi yi lhatsok nam

text.en: Please consider us with your love and kindness;
text.en-trans: dak sok dro la nyingjé tser gong té

text.en: Let the blessed rain of your compassion fall upon us all!
text.en-trans: tukjé jinlab char gyün wab tu sol

text.en: Lord Bernakchen and Rangjung Gyalmo,1
text.en-trans: gönpo berchen rangjung gyalmo dang

text.en: The Five Kings2, and the assembly of dharmapālas and ḍākinīs
text.en-trans: ku nga lasok chösung khandrö tsok

text.en: Please consider us with your love and kindness;
text.en-trans: dak sok dro la nyingjé tser gong té

text.en: Let the blessed rain of your compassion fall upon us all!
text.en-trans: tukjé jinlab char gyün wab tu sol

text.en: In brief, may all beings of the three realms and five classes,
text.en-trans: dorna rangzhen dra nyenwar ma yi

text.en: Ourselves and others, whether enemies, friends, or strangers,
text.en-trans: kham sum gyü ngé düpé yichen nam

text.en: Be protected by these unfailing sources of refuge
text.en-trans: di am önté tserab tamché du

text.en: From now on, throughout all our lives to come.
text.en-trans: kyabné luwa mepé jedzin shok

text.en: May the results of each of these pure aspirations,
text.en-trans: dak gi namdak mönpé ré dré dang

text.en: Through the unfailing power of the truth of cause and effect,
text.en-trans: lé tsok luwa mepé den tob kyi

text.en: Spark a blaze of glorious virtue, both temporal and sublime,
text.en-trans: sizhi getsen jewé palbar zhin

text.en: That will entirely empty all of saṃsāra’s triple realms.
text.en-trans: kham sum khorwé né kün tong gyur chik

text.en: We thereby dedicate the entire accumulation of merit throughout the three times, gathered by ourselves and all beings, to the objects of compassion: the six classes of beings in general, but especially those who disregard the laws governing actions and their results. May all be swiftly freed from the ripening of negativity, and may we easily attain perfect liberation!
text.en-trans: di tsönpé dakzhen dü sum gyi gé tsok tamché rik druk gi drowa chi dang khyepardu lé dré khyé du sepa nyingjé yul du gyurpa nam la ngowar ja o nammin ngenpa lé nyurdu drol té tarpa yangdakpa delak tu tobpar gyur chik
